column8: May 1, 2017 Pakatan to register with RoS in 2 weeksPETALING JAYA: Pakatan Harapan parties are to register the coalition with the Registrar of Societies (ROS) in two weeks’ time.This was decided by the PH presidential council, opposition leader Dr Wan Azizah Wan Ismail said today, Malaysiakini reported.All four parties – DAP, PKR, Amanah and Parti Pribumi Bersatu Malaysia (PPBM) – will be represented together with a new logo to be used in the 14th general election (GE14).Speaking after the PH presidential council meeting at the PPBM headquarters here today, Wan Azizah said the application will be thoroughly vetted so that there are no legal problems.“You know how the ROS is. When we wanted to register Adil back then, until today it has not been approved,” she said.Adil was the original party Wan Azizah had wanted to register before PKR.In case ROS denies PH’s registration, Wan Azizah said the various parties will use their own logos for GE14.PS: When Parti "Adil" was rejected by RoS, they then change the name to  to Parti "Keadilan" and was Accepted by RoS. For PH case, they will just tried it only ONCE...yup ONCE and then give-up. While the PH logo looked like being designed by Ahmad Maslan. They are obviously not serious and insincere in wanting to win the next GE.http://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/...ros-in-2-weeks/
PH will never win.Simple task also cannot do.

Oh, I still have a pretty good memory.  But of what relevance is that to your post?

If PH lost again, the co-called "Relaxing" PR supporter will blame everyone from Najib to Banglas.....except their beloved party who are exerting a half-hearted effort to win the GE. The supporter will just sweep away the issue and claimed it is just a small issue and will not effect the outcome of the GE. PH don't really want to win the next GE and only the blind can't see it.

I don't think so.  Some of the allegations floating around during the GE are not true.  But some appeared to be.  I really don't think it is such a big issue.  And it really won't affect the outcome of the GE.  But you want to think otherwise, up to you.
